q: Simon Cowell gets his way.`` Do I want Jordan as a judge on The X Factor panel? Yeah, that could work,'' he said in a new interview. Why not? I like her as a person. The company says the surprise management shakeup was made as part of a plan to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top.
